description: Attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of windows defender atp. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Start-Process PassThru
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-MpPreference* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\ 1* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*DisableRealtimeMonitoring* OR *DisableBehaviorMonitoring* OR *DisableScriptScanning* OR *DisableBlockAtFirstSeen*))
